name: Photoroom
headline: Power commerce photography with generative AI
description:
Photoroom provides photo editing software powerful enough to create outstanding images yet simple enough to be used without any training. We leverage deep learning to translate pixels into objects, drastically simplifying non-creative tasks such as removing backgrounds from images.

Our mission: enable entrepreneurs and small businesses to compose images that stand out.

founders.name: Matt Rouif, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder and CEO of PhotoRoom, which enables anyone to create studio-quality photos on his smartphone. 
Polytechnique & Stanford graduate. I created the first mobile apps for ski resorts, used by 50+ ski resorts globally. Then co-founded HeyCrowd app to make surveys more social. Later, I led product for the Replay video editor,  awarded « best app » of the year by Apple. GoPro acquired Replay, where he led all image editing products. I left GoPro to start PhotoRoom

founders.name: Eliot Andres, Founder
founders.description: 3 years of experience in computer vision and deep learning, before that I worked on 5 different mobile apps.

## Grow with Photoroom
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/256x256/71231a3e9a/photoroom-icon-256x256.webp)
Free
Kick-start your creativity with essential AI tools to create stunning visuals, ideal for solo creators and small teams.
[Try for free](https://photoroom.com/<https:/app.photoroom.com/create>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/256x256/71231a3e9a/photoroom-icon-256x256.webp)
Pro
Pro
Grow your business with professional product photos and standout marketing assets, perfect for small businesses and creative teams. Starting from $7.50 a month with the yearly plan.
[Start free Pro trial](https://photoroom.com/<https:/app.photoroom.com/create?modal=upsell-select-plan>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/256x256/71231a3e9a/photoroom-icon-256x256.webp)
Teams
Collaborate to create compelling imagery. Perfect for teams aiming to efficiently scale their visual content. Start from just $7.50 per month with the yearly plan, including 2 free seats.
[Start a 7-day free trial](https://photoroom.com/<https:/app.photoroom.com/create?modal=create-team>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/256x256/26e119b536/photoroom-icon-enterprise-256x256.webp)

## Made for commerce
Photoroom’s AI photo and design editor was made to help businesses spend less, sell more, and stand out online.
[Start creating](https://photoroom.com/<https:/app.photoroom.com/create>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1048x786/60c73b8bf7/sell_online_1.webp)
## Create visuals that sell
Increase your sales, engage more customers, and lower your cost per acquisition by creating high quality, top performing images with Photoroom.
[See the results](https://photoroom.com/</customer-stories>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1066x600/1b7e00d2ae/ai_images_toolkit_m_.webp)
## No designer necessary
Save thousands of dollars and hundreds of hours using Photoroom. With easy-to-use AI tools, anyone in your team can quickly create pro-quality visuals without the need for designers or expensive software.
[Start creating](https://photoroom.com/<https:/app.photoroom.com/create>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1048x786/6cbd9c9b87/home_3.webp)
## Design scroll-stopping content
Engage your audience and create a recognizable look and feel for your brand–from logos and stickers to social media posts and sales banners.
[Learn more](https://photoroom.com/</use-cases/promote-your-business>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1048x786/37d5e1cc8b/home_2.webp)
## The fastest way to pro photos
Edit and list up to 3x faster with Photoroom. Instantly resize your images for any platform, remove and apply backgrounds, and edit hundreds of photos in seconds with one-click AI tools.
[Try it now](https://photoroom.com/<https:/app.photoroom.com/create>)
Photoroom Teams
## Work better together
Collaborate and create amazing photos more efficiently than ever with Photoroom Teams. Create, share and edit designs together in real-time, from desktop or mobile. Stay on brand with shared templates, logos, and brand assets ready to add in a tap. And simplify your workflows with team feedback and edits in one central location.
[Learn about Teams](https://photoroom.com/</>)
## Explore more AI tools
[](https://photoroom.com/</tools/background-remover>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/768x432/8b69022d2c/remove_background_card.webp)
Background Remover
Remove the background of your image automatically.
[](https://photoroom.com/</tools/instant-backgrounds>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1200x800/85085e1807/ai_backgrounds_after_.webp)
AI Backgrounds
Generate realistic backgrounds in less than a second
[](https://photoroom.com/</tools/blur-background>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1200x800/1fb223a626/blur_background_after_.webp)

Blur the background of your image automatically
[](https://photoroom.com/</tools/remove-object-from-photo>)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1200x800/88361a19c7/retouch_before_.webp)
AI Retouch
Remove unwanted parts of your image with a swipe
[See all tools](https://photoroom.com/</tools>)
## Loved by companies of all sizes
See real stories from businesses like yours
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1176x448/d7202967af/source_smartly.webp)
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1200x960/bd8d3021c9/source_smartly.webp)

Customer story
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/240x80/1615d13729/source_smartly.webp)
Since adopting Photoroom API, Smartly has seen an 18.42% increase in the return on ad spend and a 72% increase in click-through rate, while saving 20 hours of work and improving image quality.
Hamza Abdou
Customer Success Manager at Smartly

![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/1176x448/97fcbb2126/source_sarah_hoofar.webp)

Sarah Hoorfar
Founder at Cowgirl Clutch
[Read story](https://photoroom.com/</customer-stories/cowgirl-clutch>)

Customer story
Customer story
![](https://storyblok-cdn.photoroom.com/f/191576/240x80/895afb8d19/source_wolt.webp)
"Photoroom's API has been key in our journey towards operational excellence in image editing. It has not only enhanced our processes but has also improved the quality of our product visuals, adding to our growth and success."
Jeff Strauss
Director of Imaging at Wolt
[Read story](https://photoroom.com/</customer-stories/wolt>)
## Go further with Photoroom
Want to unlock even more features to make your photos shine? With Photoroom Pro, you'll get access to useful features like Batch Editor, HD quality, Smart Resize, and more.
![phone](https://photoroom.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fphone-static.ff9096fe.webp&w=3840&q=75)

generated_description:
**Photoroom: Simplifying Visual Commerce with AI**

Founded in 2019 and part of Y Combinator's S20 batch, Photoroom is a Paris-based company on a mission to empower entrepreneurs and small businesses with the power of commerce photography powered by generative AI. They aim to revolutionize image-editing tasks that are often mundane and non-creative, such as background removal, allowing users to focus on their creative expression.

**Who They Are**
Photoroom started as a user-friendly photo editing software, harnessing deep learning algorithms to transform pixels into recognizable objects. With a 60-person team under the guidance of Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer, the company has quickly gained traction among users who appreciate its balance of strength and simplicity.

**What They Offer**
Their platform is packed with tools designed to enhance image production for a variety of industries, from fashion to e-commerce. Some standout features include:

- **AI Background Remover**: Instantly remove backgrounds from images.
- **AI Retouch**: Clean up images by removing unwanted elements.
- **Batch Editor**: Save time by editing multiple photos simultaneously.
  
Photoroom is not just about editing; it’s about making better visuals accessible for everyone, even those without formal design training. They've designed an intuitive platform that allows users to create marketing assets, social media content, stunning product photos, and more—all in real-time collaboration.

**Diverse Use Cases**
Photoroom caters to small businesses, freelancers, and even larger enterprises. Whether you need to create ad assets, build a brand kit, or conduct automated post-production, Photoroom’s tools are tailored to make your visuals stand out. 

**Integration and API**
For developers, Photoroom offers a seamless API that allows for easy integration into existing systems, enabling automated image editing across various applications. This feature is particularly beneficial for businesses that handle large volumes of images.

**Why It Matters**
Ultimately, Photoroom isn’t just selling a photo editor; they're providing a way for businesses to enhance their online presence, increase engagement, and drive sales—all without the need for costly designers or extensive training. Their tools have broad applicability, making professional-quality visuals achievable for anyone.

In a world where visual content can make or break an online brand, Photoroom ensures that every entrepreneur has the tools at their disposal to create stunning, high-performing images that truly resonate with their audience.

To start creating or to explore their offerings, you can visit their website at [photoroom.com](https://photoroom.com/).
